text: my name is tom moore i'm a solution
architect and i work in the uk isv team
so we look after independent software
vendors software vendors are not only
our customers but they have their own
customers so a lot of the the people i
work with it's business to business
sales and so
they onboard into the amazon partner
network and we help them
grow their business and be successful on
aws as well as working with them as
users of aws before i joined aws i
worked as an infrastructure engineer
specializing in automation and devops
and i decided to join aws to focus more
on cloud technology and the architect
role gave me kind of a broader sense of
everything that's going on in the
industry and the chance to work with
external customers
at aws has so much opportunity to do
what you want and learn what you want
you're working for a company that's
on the bleeding edge of technical
innovation you have the freedom to learn
from a vast range of technologies and
it's up to you on which areas you want
to focus in on
once you've learned these new
technologies you have the
power to talk to your customers about
how they can use them in their own
solutions
it's really great to see the work that i
do with my customers
and the impact that that has on people
in the world and businesses around the
world whether it be
using machine learning to
reduce the time it takes for someone's
insurance claim to come through and give
them the financial support they need
or
helping
businesses in the education sector with
parent and teacher communication it's
really great to see the work that i've
done with those customers and how that's
fed through to
the end users and help them
you
